name: BEACH QUEEN
description:
THE LEGEND OF WORLD'S GREATEST GAME DEV ZACK VIPER BEGINS HERE!! CHOOSE YOUR ANTHROPOMORPHIC CHARACTER, HAVE FUN IN THE SUN, AND WIN THE TITLE OF

BEACH

QUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEN!!!!!

I made this game for the second "I can't draw, but I want to make a game" jam run by charlmes. It was a ton of fun to make, and I'm happy I finally committed and made a full game. :)

Sorry about the music I also can't make music
